explains: adj. 预言的，预示的；先知的

sentences.en: Many of his warnings proved prophetic.
sentences.cn: 他的许多警告都证明是有先见之明的。

sentences.en: This ominous warning soon proved prophetic.
sentences.cn: 这一不详的警示不久就证明有预见性。

sentences.en: It's a set of images that couldn't be more foreign or more alien to the prophetic mode of the old testament prophets.
sentences.cn: 这是一组不能再背离旧约先知的形象的一组比喻了。
